about: SEEDxCEED Scanner is a robotic monitoring and analyzing system of the product card that grows sales of your store in 24 hours!  We have mixed the experience of our best sellers and experts with artificial intelligence to give you the opportunity to earn more!
photoesContent: Photos, infographics, product name, description and keywords
gPart1: SeedXceed service will help to increase sales within the shortest period, Due to our sellers' personal experience
gPart2: SeedXceed support is constantly available so you are able to implement our guides immediately
gPart3: Money-back guarantee if within 30 days after the  integration of SeedXceed's recommendations your sales have not raised
ourExp: Platform SEEDxСEED is a e-com catalyst service that has more than 1000 SKUs in circulation and a portfolio of its own brands.  Applying analytics and checklists of skillful sellers, SeedXСeed has developed its own platform to give the users an opportunity to sell and earn more money.  Using the same methodology the company promotes its own products on marketplaces, both in Russia and abroad.
upgradeCard: I want to upgrade my card
thanks: Thank you for your application, we will definitely call you back!
updateCardinfo: We have already improved over 700 cards
reviewSaller: scanner report helped me increase my card sales. I received clear instructions on what and how to change. I learned how my competitors sell similar products. And without diving into details, I just did what was recommended to me. Significantly Saved time! I recommend Scanner to everyone - it's worth the money!
